meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 10, 2023 Workforce, Education and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Equity (Internal): Racial Equity Plan (REP) Department Progress Measures Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Racial Equity Plan with a live demonstration.
agenda_items.presenter: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion; Dr. Brita Andercheck, Director, Data Analytics and Business Intelligence

agenda_items.title: Workforce (Internal): Workforce Development and Training Update (Year to Date)
agenda_items.description: Update on workforce development and training initiatives.
agenda_items.presenter: Joyce Williams, Director, Small Business Center; Dr. Dena Owens, Manager, SBC Workforce Initiatives, Small Business Center

agenda_items.title: Workforce/Equity/Education (Internal): Summary of State Legislative WEE Priorities Adopted in 2023
agenda_items.presenter: Carrie Rogers, Director, Legislative Affairs; Linley Youderian, Senior Government Affairs Coordinator

agenda_items.title: Workforce/Equity (Internal): Financial Empowerment Center and VITA Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Financial Empowerment Center post March 2023 launch.
agenda_items.presenter: Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care; Cruz Correa, Manager, Community Services

agenda_items.title: Equity (Internal): Equity Indicators Report, Second Edition 2023 Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Equity Indicators Report.
agenda_items.presenter: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion

agenda_items.title: Equity (Internal): Upcoming Council Agenda Item Seeking Authorization for Supplemental Agreement No. 5
agenda_items.description: Authorization for professional services to conduct ADA Transition Plan Phase 4.
agenda_items.presenter: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion

agenda_items.title: Equity (Internal): Upcoming Council Agenda Item to Authorize Youth Navigation Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorization for contract with K16 Ready Society, Inc. DBA Texas Initiative Programs.
agenda_items.presenter: Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care

agenda_items.title: WEE Committee Three-Month Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast for the upcoming three months.
